item.title: 1025 BCS
item.description: score:1025 Chances: Barclays PLC is set to pay its dividend of Â£0.027 on the 15th of the month, which may attract income-focused investors. The appointment of Gautam Chawla and Amrit David as investment banking co-heads in the Americas could signal growth opportunities for Barclays in the region.
